A powerful aura of peace and tranquility hangs in the air here, penetrating the soul of any traveler who passes through. Beside the pool, a creosote bush blooming in beautiful yellow flowers grows. A powerful aura of peace and tranquility hangs in the air here, penetrating the soul of any traveler who passes through. Beside the pool, a creosote bush blooming in beautiful yellow flowers grows. </font><font color="#804040">look </font><font color="#808000">Pool of Stars. </font><font color="#000080">This location is flooded with shallow, crystal clear water.</font><font color="#C0C0C0"> Soft, flowing sands surround the Pool of Stars, pale as freshly fallen snow. A lonely desert palm grows beside the pool, casting shadows upon its magical waters. Small indigenous rocks are scattered around the base of the pool, glistening with flecks of mica and quartz. A powerful aura of peace and tranquility hangs in the air here, penetrating the soul of any traveler who passes through. Beside the pool, a creosote bush blooming in beautiful yellow flowers grows. Inside the bush, a nest of desert insects chirps, filling the peaceful locale with the sound of life.</font><font color="#008080"> An enormously wide circular pool, as dark as the night sky, glitters softly under the luminous sky. There are 2 cavaliers of the Light here. An alluring marble sculpture of a youthful male is here, an ivory shield held before him. There are 40 archons of Eternal Light here. A lonely desert palm grows beside the pool, casting shadows upon its magical waters. Small indigenous rocks are scattered around the base of the pool, glistening with flecks of mica and quartz. A powerful aura of peace and tranquility hangs in the air here, penetrating the soul of any traveler who passes through. Beside the pool, a creosote bush blooming in beautiful yellow flowers grows. Malicious whispers drift around a vibrating, twisted iron portal which flickers and flares with images of a searing scarlet desert, devoid of any natural life. Contrasting sharply, on the other side a faint, ever-present choir can be heard, their angelic voices mingling with shimmering visions of a beautiful valley in never-ending bloom.</font><font color="#008080"> A graceful tree stands here, shaped vaguely like the form of a woman.</font><font color="#00FFFF"> Lord Nydekion La'Saet is here, shrouded. Spinning around his head are a diamond crystal, an onyx crystal, a turquoise crystal, a sapphire crystal, an opal crystal, a garnet crystal, an amethyst crystal, an emerald crystal, and a jade crystal. </font><font color="#804040">look </font><font color="#808000">The Higher Planar Fulcrux. </font><font color="#0000FF">This location is flooded with deep, crystal blue water.</font><font color="#C0C0C0"> This area is severely split; the northern side is almost blindingly bright and thrumming with contentment and peace, even as the southern side is filled with darkness and a choking fog. Malicious whispers drift around a vibrating, twisted iron portal which flickers and flares with images of a searing scarlet desert, devoid of any natural life. Contrasting sharply, on the other side a faint, ever-present choir can be heard, their angelic voices mingling with shimmering visions of a beautiful valley in never-ending bloom.</font><font color="#008080"> A graceful tree stands here, shaped vaguely like the form of a woman.</font><font color="#00FFFF"> Priest Shric Diluculo, Spirit of the Crystal Chord towers here. He wields a sapphire lyre in his left hand. Lord Nydekion La'Saet is here, shrouded. He wields a coral staff in his left hand. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Junior Fellow Geb, Bachelor of Temporal Science is here, shrouded. He wields a onyx wand in his right hand. Spinning around his head are a diamond crystal, an onyx crystal, a turquoise crystal, a sapphire crystal, an opal crystal, a garnet crystal, an amethyst crystal, an emerald crystal, and a jade crystal. </font><font color="#0000FF">You see exits leading north</font><font color="#C0C0C0">, </font><font color="#0000FF">east</font><font color="#C0C0C0">, </font><font color="#0000FF">south</font><font color="#C0C0C0">, </font><font color="#0000FF">west</font><font color="#C0C0C0">, </font><font color="#0000FF">up</font><font color="#C0C0C0">, and </font><font color="#0000FF">down</font><font color="#C0C0C0">. </font><font color="#696969">4347</font><font color="#999966">h, </font><font color="#696969">4358</font><font color="#999966">m, </font><font color="#696969">7943</font><font color="#999966">e, </font><font color="#FF0000">0</font><font color="#999966">p elrxkdb</font><font color="#D2D2D2"> (<u>x</u><u>h</u><u>s</u><u>p</u><u>f</u><u>w</u><u>b</u>) &lt;</font><font color="#FFEA00">Deaf</font><font color="#D2D2D2">&gt; the northern side is almost blindingly bright and thrumming with contentment and peace, even as the southern side is filled with darkness and a choking fog. Malicious whispers drift around a vibrating, twisted iron portal which flickers and flares with images of a searing scarlet desert, devoid of any natural life. Contrasting sharply, on the other side a faint, ever-present choir can be heard, their angelic voices mingling with shimmering visions of a beautiful valley in never-ending bloom.</font><font color="#008080"> A graceful tree stands here, shaped vaguely like the form of a woman.</font><font color="#00FFFF"> Junior Fellow Geb, Bachelor of Temporal Science is here, shrouded. Spinning around his head are a diamond crystal, an onyx crystal, a turquoise crystal, a sapphire crystal, an opal crystal, a garnet crystal, an amethyst crystal, an emerald crystal, and a jade crystal. Lord Nydekion La'Saet is here, shrouded. He wields a coral staff in his left hand. As light passes through the crystal, shadows dance and bend within the spire, throwing sweeping arcs of every hue upon the room: hoops of hot crimson and gold merge with lush emerald crescents, while ribbons of deep sapphire and rich mauve converge in rippling gradients. The spire itself glows with an otherworldly light, which spills down the coiling length of crystal and bathes the room in a soothing aura of colour. It has 11 months of usefulness left. The white light washes over </font><font color="#FFFF80">Malarious</font><font color="#C0C0C0">, who staggers back with a stunned expression. </font><font color="#FFFF80">Malarious</font><font color="#C0C0C0"> slides silently to the ground dead, his eyes blank. You have slain </font><font color="#FFFF80">Malarious</font><font color="#C0C0C0">. Your karma falls in response to your deeds. </font><font color="#FFFF80">Malarious</font><font color="#C0C0C0"> drops the corpse of Vasha, Lady of the East Wind. </font><font color="#FFFF80">Malarious</font><font color="#C0C0C0"> drops a plug of coltsfoot. </font></font></code></pre> </td></tr></table>
